product_name: The North Face Chilkat II Winter Boots - Men's
long_description: With waterproof construction and toasty insulation, these versatile, all-purpose winter boots keep your feet warm in subfreezing temps and deliver exceptional grip on frozen, treacherous surfaces.
short_description: With waterproof construction and toasty insulation, these versatile, all-purpose winter boots keep your feet warm in subfreezing temps and deliver exceptional grip on frozen, treacherous surfaces.
